actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor..

official_title: A bill to establish a Council on Educational Technology in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Establishes a Council on Educational Technology in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare. Sets forth the authorization and duties of such Council. Authorizes the appropriation of up to $750,000 for fiscal year 1973 and each of the four succeeding fiscal years for the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Council on Educational Technology in the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare.
